name: Time Detectives and Robbers
description:
You're a detective with a special ability. The ability to pause time, then launch yourself in whatever direction you desire.

Utilize this odd skillset to capture all the Criminals you can!
(Made for Mini Jam 60: Crime within 72 hours, actualy work time probably less due to not being able to work on it on one day.)

Jump, then use your mouse to control your trajectory.
